details: NRQL Lessons is a self-paced learning tool aimed to help New Relic customers improve their NRQL skills. Master NRQL (New Relic's Query Language) through a series of training levels using your own data.  Start from the very basics of NRQL syntax through to advanced concepts and querying techniques to become NRQL Power Users!
whatsNew: - New NRQL features and fixes for deprecations
